snippet: A State Department counselor, Thomas A. Shannon Sr., arrived in Caracas on Tuesday in what appeared to be an effort to lower tensions between the countries.
abstract: Thomas A Shannon Jr, top adviser to Sec of State John Kerry, visits Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro in effort to repair relations between countries ahead of the Summit of the Americas meeting.

byline.contributor: Patricia Torres contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela.

lead_paragraph: A State Department counselor, Thomas A. Shannon Sr., arrived in Caracas on Tuesday in what appeared to be an effort to lower tensions between the countries.

headline.main: In a Surprise, a Top Kerry Adviser Visits Venezuela
headline.print_headline: In a Surprise, a Top Kerry Adviser Visits Venezuela
